verses.name: Matthew 5:16
verses.text: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 5:17
verses.text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil.

verses.name: Matthew 5:18
verses.text: For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.
